participant_abstract.sent: Our prototype was presented and a market evaluation was performed.
The market criteria evaluation was given a 2.42 overall score.

The budget evaluation was then performed and came in three Euros too high, but a modification to remove the LCD screen and instead display the information on the television screen dropped the price within budget at 12.5 Euros.
The project was then evaluated and the team and I agreed that this group performed all tasks within the expected standards.

participant_actions.sent: A final report needs to be submitted.
The prototype has been okayed, the next step is development.

participant_decisions.sent: The marketing criteria was evaluated and found acceptable.
A modification to the remote was made and approved.
The budget was evaluated and approved.

participant_problems.sent: The color was found to be not as appealing as possible, but demanded by the company.
The overall project evaluation was not specific enough to measure what was expected of the team members.
